title: PvE game mode
body: What am I living for now that you are not making PvE game modes anymore? The Odyssey and Star Guardian game mode was the funnest thing I have ever done in my life. Long sleepless nights of excitement leading up to Odyssey. Sad.

replies.body: Okay, I made a proper post check this out: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/IEUvlq0r-no-more-odyssey-star-guardian-pve-game-mode .
